description.text:
Maybe you are not so useless after all! 
The $(b;summer)Summer Court$() is constantly under attack by a group of human raiders,
who hunt down our kind to grind them into $(b;winter)dust$(),
or steel our $(b;summer)sacred honey$()!
We, and by we I mean you of course, should $(b;autumn)take down$() those $(b;spring)pillagers$()!
Then, with you as my champion we can share our victory with the Queen, 
and I will be forever in her favour!! -the pixie is pleased with her own genius plan- 
Perfect! So...why are you still standing here? Go! Now!

You actually did it!! -the Pixie restrains herself from embarrassing you- 
Ahum! You did an admirable job, and I hope you will continue to slaughter my enemies! My very own champion! 
– The pixie seems pleased and circles happily around you–

$(b;summer)- Queen Titania is pleased with your offerings and victory for the Golden Seelie Court, as their new champion you are presented with a special reward -$()
